xml.brief: Exchange authorized Request Token for an Access Token

desc.p: Exchange authorized Request Token for an Access Token. Access Token can be used to access resources of a user who authorized the Request Token.
Standard OAuth "Consumer & Request Token" Authorization arguments are required.

returns.p: Standard OAuth 1.0a Token response - a string in a form-encoded format:
You must be prepared that there might be more parameters returned in the future (you should ignore them gracefully).
